text:
In the 2000's years, the social networks is borned. Its the innovation why revolutionate the new world. The social networks remplaced the humans reality and the reality contact social. Alex Dupont invented facebook in 2004 and now today is the big boss of social networks world. There are twenty years people do  not utilised the social networks and now no one sees themselves not using them. It's really that their innovation is the genie but the fake news apparait more and more in the world because more informatins circulate in the world, in the plateforme, in the reseau.
 Somebody gived their opinions on everything and the lies are taking more and more place in humans being. Somebody lies are here life, here familly, here friends. But thanks to the social networks the worlds more evolved for more stereotype and problème in the society. For exemple, la community LGBTQ+ was able to develloped thanks to social networks and be heard. Everyone can today be heard and be help because everyone in its place in social network. But for me, the social networks destroys all relationship with the humans and destroys the humanity. People pay attention to others in social networks but not in the reality life. For me, anxiety, stress is mostly related to social networks that feeds all this. Not everyone able to stand Alex Dupont's omnipresent gaze. The humans beings become empty. Most people are interrested in the Alex Dupont family than to their own lives. Most people prefere to hauls in tiktok while people are dying in Paris. The movies "Don't look up" in Netflix give good the futur if in continue. In addition, social networks debilise humanity. But the humanity is not lost more people is intelligente and look up.
